description:
Udyam fosters entrepreneurial spirit through startup workshops, pitch competitions,
                                mentorship programs, and incubation support. Members learn to develop business plans,
                                validate ideas, and build entrepreneurial networks.

The club organizes activities including startup pitch sessions, business plan competitions,
                                mentorship programs with successful entrepreneurs, and workshops on fundraising, marketing for
                                startups, and legal aspects of entrepreneurship. Members also get opportunities to connect with
                                investors and incubators.

Through Udyam, students develop an entrepreneurial mindset, learn to identify business
                                opportunities, and gain practical knowledge about starting and running a business. The club
                                provides a platform for aspiring entrepreneurs to turn their ideas into reality.
